content: Have we decided on when the survey would start, and collect until when?
Current plan is to kickoff this Thursday, running for two weeks.

I was planning to spend a bit of time today figuring out exactly what's needed -- one thing is that we have to draft the blog post and we have to "reactivate" all the forms. I might try to do that today. I figured I'd start with last year's blog post and tweak it.
@nikomatsakis let me know if you want me to help with that or review it, I can probably allocate an hour or so of time, though I'd rather not of course :)
